Shown With: 
French Vanilla
product.description: Tealight tree works well with most PartyLite Hurricanes. Coated metal. 8 1/4" h, 3 1/4" base diam.
product.name: Universal Tealight Tree

product.description: Organic shape intrigues with a spray of jagged branches. For use with a pillar, sold separately. Powder coated metal. 4 1/2" h, 7" w
product.name: Gaia Branch Pillar Holder

product.description: Set includes three sizes of pillars to create a visually pleasing display that glows with the shimmer of eight colors — pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Each pillar features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. One 6"x6", 6"x9", and 6"x12", plus remote control. Uses six D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately. Not recommended for use in temperatures colder than -25°F.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing White Outdoor LED Pillar Trio - Remote Control Ready

product.description: Welcome the seasons with different motifs. Includes 6 decorative magnetic panels including 2 each of fall leaves, winter snowflakes and spider webs. Includes votive cup. 5 3/4" h, 3 1/2" sq.
product.name: Change-O-Luminary™

product.description: All eyes are on you! Ghoulish glances glow red when lit with a pillar candle or tealight tree, not included. Sprayed-black glass sleeve with metal base. 9 1/2"h, 6"dia.
product.name: Spooky Eyes Hurricane

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colors – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately. Not recommended for use in temperatures colder than -25°F.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing White Outdoor LED Pillar - Remote Control Ready 6" x 12"

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colors – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately. Not recommended for use in temperatures colder than -25° F.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing White Outdoor LED Pillar - Remote Control Ready 6" x 9"

product.description: Use with remote control ready Light Illusions™ LED Pillars. Controls all functions. Battery included.
product.name: Remote Control

product.description: Favorite fall fragrance is presented in a spooky, bat-motif glass jar. Highly fragranced Halloween Night wax fills the air with the scent of rich butterscotch, vanilla and spice. Burn time: 30-40 hours. 3 1/4" h, 2 3/4" dia. Jar is safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Halloween Novelty Jar

product.description: Favorite fall fragrance is presented in a fun, pumpkin-print glass jar. Highly fragranced Hocus Pocus™ wax fills the air with the scent of coconuts and pralines. Burn time: 30-40 hours. 3 1/4" h, 2 3/4" dia. Jar is safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Halloween Novelty Jar

product.description: Rich butterscotch, vanilla and spices are slowly stirred into a batch of warm, sugary caramel. It's a gooey, creamy, sinfully sweet treat. Combine pillars of different heights and finishes with a wide selection of PartyLite holders to transform your living space. Burn time 65 - 70 hours.
product.name: Halloween Night™ 3" x 5" Grooved Pillar

product.description: Glows with the soft shimmer of eight colors – pick the one perfect for your setting or cycle through them all. Features a five and ten hour timer function and two light modes: constant illumination or candlelight flicker. Weather-resistant plastic resin. Uses two D batteries, not included. Activate manually or with remote control, sold separately. Not recommended for use in temperatures colder than -25° F.
product.name: Light Illusions™ Color Changing White Outdoor LED Pillar - Remote Control Ready 6" x 6"

product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow® or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including rich and creamy Halloween Night – butterscotch, vanilla and spices stirred into warm caramel.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Scent Plus® Melts

product.description: Enjoy 80 hours of fragrance from our most highly-scented Melts. Each tray snaps into nine Melts. Create a custom fragrance with two different Melts. Use in our ScentGlow® or Fragrance Warmers, sold separately. Available in dozens of exclusive fragrances including magical Hocus Pocus, a Halloween surprise of coconut and praline blended with sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Scent Plus® Melts

product.description: Ambiance shimmers softly through liquefied votives available in all of PartyLite’s exclusive fragrances including the smooth scent of Halloween Night™ - a creamy blend of butterscotch, vanilla, caramel and spices fills the air with a rich sweetness. Burn time: 8 - 11 hours. PartyLite votives completely liquefy requiring a votive holder for burning.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Votive Candle

product.description: Coconut and praline add an unexpected twist to this mysterious blend of sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes. It's a magical Halloween surprise. Burn time: 8 - 11 hours. PartyLite votives completely liquefy requiring a votive holder for burning.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Votive Candle

product.description: Coconut and praline add an unexpected twist to this mysterious blend of sugar berries, grapefruit and floral notes. It's a magical Halloween surprise. Featuring our patented Universal tealight cup, tealights will completely liquefy while burning. Tealight cup is recyclable. Burn Time: 4-6 hours.
product.name: Hocus Pocus™ Universal Tealight® Candle

product.description: Tealights are perfect for layering fragrance and creating multiple points of light with our beautiful selection of home accents. Available in all of PartyLite's exclusive fragrances including the smooth scent of Halloween Night™ - a creamy blend of butterscotch, vanilla, caramel and spices fills the air with a rich sweetness. Featuring our patented Universal tealight cup, tealights will completely liquefy while burning. Tealight cup is recyclable. Burn Time: 4-6 hours.
product.name: Halloween Night™ Universal Tealight® Candle

product.description: Each petite pumpkin with a decorative neckband delivers our most highly fragranced wax. Includes one of each scent, Ginger Pumpkin, Leaves of Fun™ and Spiced Cider, in a decorative gift box. 2 1/2"h, 2 1/2" dia. Burn time: 30-40 hours each. Jars are safe for food use after candle has consumed.
product.name: Joy of Autumn Scented Candle Trio

product.shown_with:
Shown With: 
Ginger Pumpkin
product.description: Seasonal sculptural form also scents the air! Simply add Scent Plus® Melts or Scented Oil and turn on for a steady stream of fragrance. Includes lid; remove for stronger fragrance throw. Electric ceramic warmer; glazed finish. Interior of base is orange. White cord. 6"h, 5 1/4"dia.
product.name: ScentGlow® Warmer - Autumn Pumpkin

product.description: Unscented, textured ivory pillars radiate an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in color and texture may occur. Includes one pillar in each size: 3”x4”, 3”x5” and 3”x6”.
product.name: GloLite by PartyLite™ 3-Piece Pillar Garden - Unscented (ivory)

product.description: A haunted Halloween scene adorns the decal wrapped around this spooky pair of glass votive cups. Use with tealights or votives, sold separately. 2 3/4" h, 2 1/4" dia.
product.name: Halloween Night Votive Pair

product.description: Unscented, textured ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in color and texture may occur. Burn time: 80-100 hrs.
product.name: GloLite by PartyLite™ Pillar - Unscented (ivory) 3"x6"

product.description: Unscented textured ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in color and texture may occur. Burn time: 60-75 hrs.
product.name: GloLite by PartyLite™ Pillar - Unscented (ivory) 3"x5"

product.description: Unscented, textured ivory pillar radiates an instant all-over glow. Each GloLite candle is individually crafted so slight variations in color and texture may occur. Burn time: 50-60 hrs.
product.name: GloLite by PartyLite™ Pillar - Unscented (ivory) 3"x4"

product.description: A happy haunting scene crafted of black metal. Use as a holder for pillar candles or large tealights, sold separately. With the included glass dish, use with Scented Oil or Scent Plus® Melts and a tealight, also sold separately. 5"h, 4 3/4"w.
product.name: Fragrance Warmer - Trick or Treat

product.description: Magnetic accessory pieces get the Bones™ gang into the spirit! A true conversation piece.
product.name: Bones™ Costume Kit

product.description: You know what he ate last! A bone dangles inside our playful pooch skeleton. Black matte-finished metal with glass votive cup. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. 9 1/4"l.
product.name: Sticks

product.description: Skeletal kitty can’t resist a fish. Black matte-finished metal with glass votive cup. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. 7 1/2"h.
product.name: Stones

product.description: Meet the Mrs.! With her dangling earrings and lengthy lashes, she’s the perfect match for our Bones candle holder. For use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. Metal with a matte black finish. 15"h.
product.name: Mrs. Bones™

product.description: Our silly skeleton glows with the light of a votive or tealight, sold separately. Pair him with Mrs. Bones to create the cutest, creepiest Halloween couple. Metal. 15 1/2"h.
product.name: Bones™

product.description: Popular candle holders rendered in a new smaller size! Fill the glass vessels with your own decorative accents and finish by adding the votive cup on top. Light from a votive or tealight, sold separately, sets the trio aglow. Set includes one of each height: 5", 6", and 7".
product.name: Symmetry Trio

product.description: Something spooky is brewing! A spinning ghost haunts our porcelain witch’s hat. Heat from a tealight, sold separately, sets the ghost in motion. 7" h, 7" w.
product.name: Spooky Hat Tealight House

product.description: Charming vampire friend and an entourage of glittery bats gather around the glow of a tealight, sold separately. Metal. 12"h to top of head, 5" base dia.
product.name: Count Batcula™ Tealight Holder

product.description: More whimsical than wicked, our kindly witch holds a flickering tealight, sold separately. Metal with glitter accents. 13 1/4"h to top of hat, 5" base dia.
product.name: Abracadabra™ Witch Tealight Holder

product.description: Metal mesh wings unfurl mysteriously around a 4 3/4"h purple glass cup for use with a votive or tealight, sold separately. Remove chain for tabletop use. Overall: 14 1/2"h, 5"w.
product.name: Hanging Bat Votive Holder
